Table of Contents Home Configuration License Manuals UserManual.pdf Release Notes Sitemap Versions What is Tokenize Product Downloads? Tokenize Product Downloads is a Magento extension that allows a guest user to download their purchase without the need to create an account and sign in. By eliminating the need for users to create an account, you should see improvements in sales conversion rates, and fewer abandoned carts, as a result of a better user experience.

docs.title: What is Tokenize Product Downloads?

docs.text: This documentation is for Magento 1.x. For Magento 2.x, see here . Configuration To configure Tokenize Product Downloads, log into the admin panel and navigate to System → Configuration → Tokenize Product Downloads (left sidebar). General Settings Enable Tokenize Product Downloads : Enable the extension. By default, it is disabled. Token generation and use of tokenized product download URLs will not function unless enabled. Catalog Settings Disable Guest Checkout if Cart Contains Downloadable Items : Under System → Configuration → Catalog , set this field to No to allow guest checkout for downloadable products.
